PG13談威少重返奧城：我都能獲得歡迎，何況他是雷霆隊史第一人？

在1月10日，也就是後天，火箭控衛Russell Westbrook將首次重返奧克拉荷馬城，倒戈前東家雷霆，如無意外，威少一定會獲得排山倒海般的掌聲。

畢竟，忍者龜威少可以說是雷霆隊史第一的球員，預計，他的0號球衣一定會被退役，他甚至還有可能得到一座雕像也說不定。

而近日，在接受媒體採訪時，快艇前鋒Paul George也談到了對於昔日隊友威少重返雷霆的一些看法。

George說道：“威少在雷霆的貢獻遠遠多過我，上次回去那裡，我獲得了他們的掌聲，Westbrook的掌聲當然應該超過我多多聲才是。”

My friend Kobe Bryant's brother-in-law is a travel agent who is paid a daily wage of three hundred dollars plus a twenty percent commission on the sales he makes so his job isn't on commission only. So far this year his profits has satisfied his expectation. He said he would be on strike but it turned out he was just joking because his dad is an intense patriot. If he had gone on strike his dad wouldn't have been happy. His granddad was commissioned as a senior officer in the army whereas his great grandfather obtained a commission as a sergeant major in the air force during the first world war. He was buried with full military honours. His auntie is a professional footballer. She never goes off on a sidetrack during a football match. His younger sister is a concierge who fells she's made the wrong career choice. I said "why not wiped the slate clean and start over in a different career?" Kobe too suggested that she study a degree course and start with a clean slate. She blames her bad career decision on Kobe. I then said "let's just wipe the slate clean. It's over" She blames him for convincing her to be a concierge. Well that's the way the cookie crumbles. His cousin is planning on doing a PhD since nowadays a master's isn't worth the paper it's written on let alone a bachelor degree. Last Wednesday he was almost swindled out of thousands of dollars. I told him that person was a scammer who was trying to swindle money from him. The contract isn't worth the paper it's printed on. Fortunately he listened to me. Otherwise the swindler would've swindled him out of thousands of dollars. I've read in the newspapers that some customers were promised to get a refund if they weren't happy with the products but later they found out they had been sold down the river because they have been unable to find the swindler to date. The scammer didn't honour the contracts.

- Acquired Jae Crowder, Kyle Korver, Grayson Allen, the draft rights to Darius Bazley (No. 23 pick), and the Jazz’s 2020 first-round pick (1-7 and 15-30 protected) from the Jazz in exchange for Mike Conley.

- Acquired the draft rights to Brandon Clarke (No. 21 pick) from the Thunder in exchange for the draft rights to Darius Bazley (No. 23 pick) and the Grizzlies’ 2024 second-round pick.

- Acquired Josh Jackson, De’Anthony Melton, the Suns’ 2020 second-round pick, and the Suns’ 2021 second-round pick (protected 36-60) from the Suns in exchange for Kyle Korver and Jevon Carter.

- Acquired Andre Iguodala, the Warriors’ 2024 first-round pick (top-four protected), and cash ($2MM) from the Warriors in exchange for Julian Washburn (two-way).

【傷勢影響出勤率 Leonard終於突破生涯總得分9000大關】

Leonard今天面對金塊攻下30分，生涯總得分累積來到9023分，成為同梯球員中第7位達到9000分的球員。6位分別是Kemba Walker、Klay Thompson、Kyrie Irving、Jimmy Butler、Isaiah Thomas、Tobias Harris，其中前3人更是已經突破10000分大關。

如同開場所說，Leonard生涯單季最多出賽從未超過75場，其中2017-18年更因傷缺席73場，這都讓他的累積得分進度落後給不少同梯球員。排在他前面的6位球員累積出賽數都至少超過500場起跳，而Leonard至今僅有497場出賽。
截至尋日 @NBA_Math

Butler心中最難防的五位球星：詹皇死神領銜，另三人為後場球員！

近日，在接受媒體採訪時，曾四次入選最佳防守陣容的熱火核心Jimmy Butler談到了自己心目中最難防守的五位球星。

第一位就是湖人核心，現役聯盟第一人，Lebron James。

接著，Butler的第二位人選是目前仍在養傷的籃網球星Kevin Durant。

第三位人選，則是KD在籃網的隊友：Kyrie Irving。

接著，論最難被防守的球員，怎麼能少了火箭當家球星、過去兩年的得分王，James Harden呢？

最後一位，Butler將手中一票投給了三屆總冠軍得主、NBA歷史上第一位全票常規賽MVP：Stephen Curry。

Source：https://homeofplaymakers.com/sports/basketball/top-5-toughest-players-for-jimmy-butler-to-guard/2/

I'm a fan of Vince Carter. He was certainly a very exciting slam dunker who was worth his weight in gold to Raptors. Don't get me wrong- I still enjoy watching him play even though his prime has passed. He proved his worth to Raptors by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made significant progress with his three point shooting since he joined Grizzlies. Unfortunately his leg injury has progressed fairly quickly in the last five weeks causing him to be sidelined for six weeks through injury. He complained that taking a six-week hiatus was too long but it's for his own good. He has a follow-up to the doctor next month. His best friend LeBron James will also be out of commission until his back heals. He hasn't made much progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next week. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of stretching and training. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to beat Warriors as Cavaliers in my opinion. Just the other day Lakers didn't just beat Rockets. Lakers wiped the floor with Rockets. Everybody was on the edge of their seats. LeBron yelled at Rockets "In your face" the moment Lakers won. Rockets has lost its edge to some extent since its point leaders left the team. Recently Bulls edged out Rockets by five points which reminded me of Warriors edging out Cavaliers by one point. The role of every coach in every team is clearly defined. Everybody has a vital role to play in every team. In addition, the government has appointed a commission to look at the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been established to examine family violence in NBA which I wholeheartedly support. My friend John has bought a front row ticket for the NBA All-Star game which was very hard to get. I said "Fair enough. It's difficult to get a front row ticket but you should've asked your boss if you could get a few days off beforehand as you'll need to fly to America for it." He was too excited lol. During the first world war, the Japanese government granted asylum to his great granddad. His cousins Tom and Jerry have been accused of robbery. If convicted they would be jailed for two years. The judge granted Tom bail but refused to grant bail to Jerry. Tom's parents agreed to post bail for him who is now remanded on bail of eight thousand dollars whereas Jerry is remanded in custody for eleven days. John's maid has been stealing jewellery from him. After an investigation, he said "She's been stealing jewellery. I'll grant you that" His best friend will be coming to Hong Kong soon so he'll have him over for a few nights. I said "having your best friend around for a few nights is fair enough but you should let your family know before having him over" My brother too said "I grant that it's very kind of you to have him over but you should let your family know beforehand"
